mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_calendar_event ( event_title, event_date, event_type, repeat_type, description, color, show_countdown, rec_creator, rec_create_time, rec_revisor, rec_revise_time, arch_flag ) VALUES ( #{eventTitle}, #{eventDate}, #{eventType}, #{repeatType}, #{description}, #{color}, #{showCountdown}, #{recCreator}, NOW(), #{recRevisor}, NOW(), 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_calendar_event WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 1
SELECT * FROM km_calendar_event WHERE rec_creator = #{username} AND arch_flag = 1 ORDER BY event_date ASC, rec_create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE km_calendar_event SET event_title = #{eventTitle}, event_date = #{eventDate}, event_type = #{eventType}, repeat_type = #{repeatType}, description = #{description}, color = #{color}, show_countdown = #{showCountdown}, rec_revisor = #{recRevisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE km_calendar_event SET arch_flag = 0, rec_revisor = #{revisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
